name: Exocrida
description:
● Description:

The Swarm is a harmonious single organism, it avoids danger and seeks different paths to its victim. 

 

The Swarm acupunctured a space station; you can't let it spread.

This is a game about the destruction of hordes of parasites.
Take on the role of a soldier and challenge the Swarm.

For effective clearing of the space base, use several types of weapons and grenades.

But be careful, the Swarm is diverse in its forms. (I mean here several different types of beetles and even unique bosses, yes.)


● Controls:

[W][A][S][D] - Movement
Left mouse button - Shooting
Right mouse button - Throw a grenade
Mouse Wheel - Change weapons
[Q] - Change grenades
